page.title: 01 Principal Features E.K.
page.content: In our block there is a wide range of shops of high quality.They are well laid out for maximum efficiency.E.K. has one main shopping centre in the middle and other smaller neighbourhood shops round about. My family mainly use the large shops because it is cheaper and have more variety.If we just need the odd thing or two we use the Greenhills Shopping Centre which has recently been renovated. In the block there is a lot of footpaths and bridges.It is laid out so the majority of the paths are away from roads for safety. Around E.K. there is a Green Belt that keeps E.K.separate from Glasgow. I am getting worried because the Green Belt is shrinking.I hope it stops now because if it does not we could become part of Glasgow.
